content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** *the suzette crochet hook pouch is a great stash buster project that works up beautifully with any worsted weight yarn it takes less than one hour to complete and is a simple and practical project it s perfect for storing a hook or two to keep in your current w i p basket or to toss into a crochet travel bag when you re on the go the sizing allows for a variety of hook lengths so you can give your hook a nice cozy home also great for storing pencils and pens * **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - special stitch tutorial with direct links for detailed walk through - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase **
